statements: SELECT * FROM regulatory_approval_status;
SELECT product_name, country FROM regulatory_approval_status;
SELECT approval_status FROM regulatory_approval_status WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT product_name, approval_status FROM regulatory_approval_status WHERE approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT product_id, product_name, country, approval_status FROM regulatory_approval_status WHERE country = 'UK';
SELECT product_id, product_name, country, approval_status FROM regulatory_approval_status WHERE approval_status = 'Approved'
SELECT * FROM regulatory_approval_status WHERE country = 'USA' AND approval_status = 'Pending'
SELECT product_id, approval_status, product_name FROM regulatory_approval_status WHERE country LIKE '%land'
SELECT country, product_name FROM regulatory_approval_status WHERE approval_status = 'Rejected' ORDER BY country DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, approval_status FROM regulatory_approval_status WHERE country = 'Canada' AND approval_status = 'Approved'
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_name, approval_status FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT product_id, product_name, approval_status FROM pharmaceutical_products ORDER BY approval_status ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_approval WHERE approval_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, country FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE country = 'Japan' AND approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT product_name, patent_number FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, approval_status, country FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE patent_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_approval WHERE approval_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY country, expiration_date ASC;

SELECT pharmaceutical_products.product_name, regulatory_approval.approval_date FROM pharmaceutical_products INNER JOIN regulatory_approval ON pharmaceutical_products.product_id = regulatory_approval.product_id WHERE regulatory_approval.country = 'Canada';
SELECT * FROM patented_pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM patented_pharmaceutical_products WHERE country_approved='USA';
SELECT product_name, country_approved FROM patented_pharmaceutical_products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, r.country, r.approval_status FROM patented_pharmaceutical_products p JOIN regulatory_approval r ON p.product_id = r.product_id WHERE r.approval_status='Approved';
SELECT p.product_name, c.country_name FROM patented_pharmaceutical_products p JOIN country_details c ON p.country_approved = c.country_code WHERE p.product_name LIKE '%tablet%';
SELECT * FROM patented_pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_name, country_approved FROM patented_pharmaceutical_products WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_approval WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY approval_status DESC;
SELECT product_name, approval_status FROM patented_pharmaceutical_products p JOIN regulatory_approval r ON p.product_id = r.product_id WHERE r.country = 'Canada';
SELECT pd.country_name, COUNT(*) AS total_approvals FROM regulatory_approval ra JOIN country_details pd ON ra.country = pd.country_code GROUP BY pd.country_name ORDER BY total_approvals DESC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, approval_status FROM products WHERE approval_status = 'approved' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, patent_number FROM products WHERE patent_number IS NOT NULL AND approval_status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE country_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, approval_status FROM products WHERE approval_status = 'rejected';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE approval_status = 'approved';
SELECT product_name, patent_number FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT country_name, approval_date FROM countries JOIN product_country_approval ON countries.country_id = product_country_approval.country_id WHERE product_country_approval.product_id = 3;

SELECT product_name, country_name FROM products JOIN product_country_approval ON products.product_id = product_country_approval.product_id JOIN countries ON product_country_approval.country_id = countries.country_id;
SELECT product_name, approval_status FROM products WHERE approval_status = 'pending' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, patent_number FROM Product WHERE approval_status='Approved';
SELECT country_name, continent FROM Country ORDER BY country_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patent WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, country_name, status_name FROM ProductApproval JOIN ApprovalStatus ON ProductApproval.status_id = ApprovalStatus.status_id;
SELECT * FROM Product ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, patent_number FROM Product WHERE approval_status='Approved';
SELECT * FROM Country WHERE continent='Europe' ORDER BY country_name DESC;

SELECT p.product_name, c.country_name, a.status_name FROM Product p JOIN ProductApproval pa ON p.product_id = pa.product_id JOIN Country c ON pa.country_id = c.country_id JOIN ApprovalStatus a ON pa.status_id = a.status_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Patent WHERE expiration_date >= CURRENT_DATE;
